name: Default››export
description:
A simple and interfaceless way to set the common export settings most of us use for sharing visuals.


Run this plugin to set all Frames to either: 1x PNG and 2x PNG; 2x PNG, 3x PNG and SVG; or; 1x PNG, 2x PNG, 3x PNG and SVG. Perfect for setting files up for Developer handover.


You can also use the iOS or Android commands to assign the common export settings for those platforms for handoff in Figma or tools such as Zeplin.


You can update either your entire file by not selecting anything, or, select a set of objects to apply your desired setting to.


This plugin is free to us, but if you fancy buying me a coffee because it's been useful to you, I'd be grateful: https://ko-fi.com/kemiljk
